title: Key matchups, players to watch and projections for CFP quarterfinals
content: We break down Ohio State-Miami, Texas Tech-Oregon, Indiana-Alabama and Georgia-Ole Miss. Watch every game via the ESPN MegaCast.

title: Pats' Diggs faces strangulation, assault charges
content: Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs is facing a felony charge of strangulation and a misdemeanor charge of assault from an alleged Dec. 2 incident.

title: Cowboys release two-time Pro Bowl CB Diggs
content: The Cowboys have released cornerback Trevon Diggs. He will become a free agent if he goes unclaimed on waivers.

title: Seals, in first start for TCU, leads OT win vs. USC
content: Ken Seals passed for 258 yards and the winning touchdown to Jeremy Payne in overtime as TCU rallied to beat No. 16 USC 30-27 on Tuesday night in the Alamo Bowl.

title: Redick, Doncic say refs allowed Pistons fouling
content: After the Pistons turned what had been a tight game for most of Tuesday night into a 128-106 rout, Lakers coach JJ Redick admitted the officiating affected his team.

title: Edgecombe's last-second 3 propels Sixers in OT
content: Rookie VJ Edgecombe rewarded the Sixers' faith in him by connecting on a tiebreaking 25-foot jumper with 1.7 seconds left, lifting Philadelphia to a 139-136 win over the Grizzlies.

title: NCAA clarifies eligibility stance amid criticism
content: President Charlie Baker clarified the NCAA's position on college eligibility for players with NBA experience Tuesday, saying "it has not and will not grant eligibility to any prospective or returning student-athletes who have signed an NBA contract."

title: CMC misses Tue. practice ahead of Seahawks tilt
content: Niners star Christian McCaffrey missed Tuesday's practice with a stiff back, while left tackle Trent Williams nursed a right hamstring injury ahead of Saturday's showdown with the Seahawks.

title: Duke lands prized PG Rippey; '26 class now No. 1
content: Duke moved atop the 2026 recruiting class rankings after Deron Rippey Jr., the No. 3-ranked point guard in the country, became the Blue Devils' third five-star commitment.

content: Which teams will make coaching changes? Could Jeff Hafley or Chris Shula land an open job? Here's our coach movement intel ahead of Week 18.

content: The unbeaten 'Dores weren't expected to be this good this season, but we could very well see history made in March.

content: At the end of 2025, here's a rundown of the locks, teams with work to do and long shots. Plus, each team's MVP.

content: During a week with a lean schedule, one thing became clear: The rest of the Big Ten is looking up at UCLA.

content: March is months away, but UConn, Texas, South Carolina, UCLA and LSU look locked in on the top two seed lines.

content: NIkola Jokic's knee injury puts him in jeopardy of missing too many games to qualify for the NBA MVP award.

content: From The Block to poster dunks, here's a look back at the 23 photos that define James' 23-year NBA career.

content: The race to be crowned top scorer for club and country in 2025 is over, and some big names were in contention for the plaudits once again.

title: Wolves draw sums up Man Utd's year: Hope followed by howlers
content: Any momentum generated by Man United's Boxing Day win over Newcastle was brought to a shuddering halt on Tuesday -- this time by the worst side in the division.

content: The January transfer window opens soon, and top clubs like Liverpool have big and expensive decisions to make.

title: Our favorite MLB games of 2025: World Series Game 7, four-homer performances and much more
content: From playoff thrillers to epic individual achievements, these are the moments we'll remember for decades to come.

content: With the calendar set to turn to 2026, ESPN looks back at the 2025 F1 season to assign letter grades to all 21 drivers in the world championship.

title: 26 QBs to watch in the college football transfer portal
content: From top targets to top backups, we've tiered QBs ahead of the transfer portal officially opening Jan. 2.

title: Updated NFL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus what we learned about each team this season
content: Let's update our NFL Power Rankings one more time ahead of Week 18. We also picked out lessons for all 32 teams in 2025.

title: 150 prospects: We stacked players in the CFP by NFL draft stock
content: From Indiana to James Madison, we picked out every CFP player who could factor into the 2026 NFL draft.

title: Seven of the latest innovations that could alter the future of soccer
content: Agents picking clubs for their clients like a video game? Eye tests for strikers? Clubs monitoring everything about a player? Here's what the future could hold.

title: Puka Nacua delivers more 2025 fantasy football championships than any other player
content: The final "MNF" of the season featured two of the top three players rostered by 2025 fantasy football champions.

title: Early Week 18 bets: Ravens-Steelers to be a slugfest; Drake Maye for MVP
content: Which lines offered value once odds came out? Here are games we are eyeing for bets going into Week 18.

title: ‚ÄòSecond fiddle‚Äô fantasy? Sorry, Beijing - US and India won't settle for silver
content: A new narrative suggests China will lead, with the US and India vying for second. Analyst Keji Mao argues US "strategic altruism" towards India has ended due to American decline anxiety. However, the article counters that US decline is exaggerated, China's economic rise faces headwinds, and India is forging an independent path, leading to a complex, contested global order.

title: BJP shares video of brutal assault on woman in West Bengal; slams CM Mamata
content: BJP shared a video showing a woman and her family being brutally attacked with bamboo sticks in Uttar Bhangnamari village, Basanti block, South 24 Parganas, West Bengal. The main accused named are Jalil Laskar, Munna Laskar, and Arif Laskar. BJP leaders, including Amit Malviya, criticized the state government, claiming the attack reflects a failure of law and order and a lack of safety for women in West Bengal.

title: India‚ÄìUS ties: Embassy shares key moments of 2025; eyes stronger year ahead
content: The US Embassy in India celebrated a year of robust bilateral ties, highlighting key moments like Prime Minister Modi's meeting with President Trump and the signing of a major defense pact.  Discussions also covered space collaboration and leadership exchanges, underscoring a commitment to strengthening the partnership despite global challenges. Both nations look forward to continued cooperation.

title: VHT: Pant fails ahead of NZ ODI series selection; Odisha hand Delhi 1st defeat
content: Delhi‚Äôs campaign this season has largely depended on one strong batting effort in each game. The absence of such a performance on Wednesday not only cost them the match but also their position at the top of the points table, a setback that could affect them later in the tournament.

title: Code to factory: Tech CEOs who went 'founder mode‚Äô; here's how they led the AI race
content: Tech leaders are entering 'Founder Mode' in 2025. CEOs like Sergey Brin, Satya Nadella, Elon Musk, Mark Zuckerberg, and Brian Chesky are directly involved in their companies' AI strategies. They are making significant changes, from coding to restructuring, to win the AI race. This hands-on approach aims to secure future success in the rapidly evolving technology landscape.

title: Happy New Year 2026: 30+ Wishes, images, greetings, quotes and more
content: As 2026 approaches, the article highlights the diverse ways people celebrate and express New Year's wishes. It emphasizes the value of simple, heartfelt messages, relatable quotes, and genuine status updates, alongside visual elements like images and wallpapers, to connect with loved ones during this transitional period.

title: TOI Habit Index: India‚Äôs 2025 entertainment split - Netflix nights, reel breaks
content: India's screen time is dominated by OTT content, with Netflix leading viewership. Short-form videos like reels also capture significant attention, driven by a desire for relaxation and entertainment. Viewers are increasingly aware of digital fatigue, aiming to reduce aimless scrolling and screen time.

title: India‚Äôs ODI squad vs NZ: Gill to lead; Bumrah and Pandya likely to be rested
content: The Indian squad for the upcoming ODI series against New Zealand will be selected on January 3. The series begins on January 11 in Vadodara. Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma are set to feature. Shubman Gill will lead the team. Hardik Pandya and Jasprit Bumrah may be rested for workload management. Dhruv Jurel is a potential wicketkeeper choice.

title: Neuralink and parenting: Meta AI chief Alexandr Wang on kids; will wait until Neuralink advances
content: Meta's AI head, Alexandr Wang, revealed he will delay having children until advanced brain-computer interface (BCI) technology like Neuralink is widely available. Wang believes children's early neuroplasticity offers a prime window for intuitive BCI integration, potentially enabling future generations to learn and utilize superintelligence tools more effectively than adults.

title: Why Sensex, Nifty underperformed in 2025 & where are they headed in 2026? Top points
content: Indian equities lagged global markets in 2025 due to muted corporate earnings, FII selling, and missed AI rally. Despite touching record highs, broader market sentiment remained subdued. Experts anticipate a stronger 2026, driven by domestic growth, potential FII return, and improved valuations, with Nifty and Sensex targets set higher.

title: From Coldplay to AQI and Dhurandhar ‚Äî What India talked about in 2025
content: 2025 was a year of extremes for India, marked by the spiritual grandeur of the Maha Kumbh, a tragic stampede, and Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan's stabbing. The year also saw significant policy shifts like zero income tax up to Rs 12 lakh and a strong counter-terror response with Operation Sindoor following the Pahalgam attack.

title: Ayesha Curry‚Äôs 'A+ wife move' for Stephen Curry goes viral online
content: Ayesha Curry recently garnered widespread praise from fans for wearing her husband Stephen Curry's Davidson jersey during a visit to his alma mater. This heartwarming gesture, seen during a tribute to the NBA star, effectively silenced recent marriage rumors. Fans lauded her unwavering support and loyalty, highlighting the couple's strong bond.

title: Aadhaar‚ÄìPAN linking deadline ends today: How to link, penalty and other details
content: Linking your PAN card with Aadhaar is crucial to avoid penalties. The Income Tax department's portal guides you through a simple online process involving your PAN and Aadhaar numbers, followed by an OTP verification. Failure to link by December 31, 2025, will render your PAN inoperative, impacting tax refunds and leading to higher tax deductions and collections.

title: Jagannath temple pulls 2026 calendars: Image shows deities in incorrect positions; triggers backlash
content: The Jagannath temple administration in Puri has apologized and halted the sale of 2026 calendars after depicting the sibling deities in incorrect positions on the Ratna Singhasan. The administration attributed the error to a century-old manuscript, stating there was no intent to offend religious sentiments. Political parties criticized the inaccuracies, which also extended to the depiction of Rath Yatra chariots

title: US-based Doctor‚Äôs eye-opening post flags unsettling health reality of 2025
content: The year 2025 revealed health dangers beyond viruses. Extreme longevity proved detrimental. Air pollution impacted lungs and health year-round. Mental burnout caused physical harm. Isolation posed risks similar to smoking. Fitness obsessions led to injuries. Heat waves became deadly. Sleep debt damaged brains. AI questioned medical ethics. Health anxiety replaced tracking. Balance, not extremes, is the future.

title: New Labour codes: Draft rules out - how will salary, gratuity, allowances be calculated? Explained
content: New Labour Codes: The Ministry of labour has released the draft labour codes on December 31, 2025. The new rules and a set of FAQs clarify wage, gratuity, allowances calculation. We take a look:

title: NFL trade rumours: Joe Burrow to Jets as Bengals land Fernando Mendoza
content: A wild NFL trade rumor suggests the Bengals could acquire Heisman winner Fernando Mendoza, potentially using Joe Burrow to secure five first-round picks from the Jets. While fans dismiss the idea, Mendoza's potential as a top prospect and the Bengals' defensive needs are explored. Burrow's massive contract complicates any such hypothetical move.

title: Pralay missile test: India conducts successful salvo launch off Odisha coast - watch
content: India successfully conducted a salvo launch of two indigenously developed Pralay missiles off the coast of Odisha. The tests, conducted in quick succession from the same launcher, met all flight objectives, demonstrating the missile system's operational reliability and readiness for induction into the armed forces.

title: Stefon Diggs‚Äô viral proposal rehearsal sparks buzz amid Cardi B backlash
content: A viral video of Stefon Diggs appearing to propose to Cardi B on the field, later revealed as him fixing her gear, has reignited public interest in their relationship. This comes amid Cardi B addressing online criticism and Diggs facing felony assault charges, which he denies. The Patriots support him as the legal process unfolds.

title: 'Don‚Äôt let them decide'- Ex-England captain's message to Khawaja on Test retirement
content: Former India opener Aakash Chopra backs Delhi Capitals to win the 2026 Women's Premier League. He also tips Royal Challengers Bengaluru captain Smriti Mandhana to dominate the batting charts and win the Orange Cap. Delhi Capitals' Shafali Verma is also a strong contender for the top run-scorer award.

title: 'Deepest condolences': EAM attends Khaleda Zia's funeral; hands PM Modi‚Äôs letter to son Tarique
content: India's external affairs minister S Jaishankar conveyed Prime Minister Modi's condolences to BNP Acting Chairman Tarique Rahman in Dhaka following the passing of former PM Begum Khaleda Zia. Jaishankar highlighted Zia's significant influence on India-Bangladesh ties and expressed optimism for future partnership development. India is officially participating in the funeral rites.

title: CEO Scott Tannen's 7 cues that quietly tell employers you walked in casually
content: Scott Tannen, CEO of Boll & Branch, uses one early interview question to test seriousness. Candidates who cannot explain the company reveal more than ignorance‚Äîthey signal indifference. Here, we examine the seven subtle cues that tell employers you came unprepared, and why curiosity, context and intent now separate strong applicants from the rest.

title: BBL: Car breaks down, Perth Scorchers players push Uber to stadium ‚Äì Watch
content: Laurie Evans, Ashton Agar, Aaron Hardie and Mahli Beardman were travelling to the stadium in an Uber when the car broke down on the way. With the vehicle coming to a halt, the four players stepped out and pushed it in an effort to restart it, before getting back in and continuing their journey to the ground.

title: Nimesulide painkiller ban: Centre bars oral formulations over 100 mg, cites health risks
content: The central government has imposed an immediate ban on the manufacture, sale and distribution of all oral formulations of the painkiller nimesulide containing more than 100 mg in immediate-release form, citing risks to human health and the availability of safer alternatives. The decision, taken under the Drugs and Cosmetics Act after expert consultation, was notified by the health ministry. Separately, the ministry proposed changes to the Drugs Rules, inviting public feedback within 30 days.

title: Pandya power: All-rounder goes on rampage; helps Baroda put 417 in Vijay Hazare
content: The platform was laid by openers Nitya Pandya and Amit Pasi, who put together a 230-run stand for the first wicket. Nitya scored 122 from 110 balls, while Pasi made 127 from 93 deliveries, taking Hyderabad‚Äôs bowlers out of the game early.

title: Watch: Jalen Hurts‚Äô standout season goes viral as Eagles QB meets Jacklyn Romano
content: Eagles quarterback Jalen Hurts was recently seen in a casual Instagram video with fitness influencer Jacklyn Romano, sporting matching tennis-style outfits. This off-field moment garnered attention during the Eagles' successful season, which culminated in Hurts being named Super Bowl MVP after leading his team to victory.

title: Turkey arrests 125 IS suspects; coordinated raids across 25 provinces
content: Turkey has detained 125 suspected Islamic State members in nationwide raids across 25 provinces. These operations follow a deadly clash in Yalova where three police officers and six IS members were killed. The interior minister vowed to confront those threatening national unity with state might.

title: Republic Day 2026: Animal contingent to march on Kartavya Path ‚Äî Camels, dogs to debut
content: India's 2026 Republic Day parade will showcase the Army's animal contingent, featuring Bactrian camels, Zanskar ponies, raptors, and dogs. This historic display highlights their crucial role in extreme terrains, emphasizing endurance, sacrifice, and India's growing self-reliance in defence capabilities. The parade underscores the integration of tradition and innovation in military operations.

title: IB curriculum is not a shortcut: Study abroad expert explains what really matters for admissions
content: The International Baccalaureate (IB) program equips students with valuable skills for global university admissions, fostering critical thinking and independence. While respected, it doesn't guarantee entry into top universities, especially in the US, which employs a holistic review. The UK system often shows a clearer advantage for IB students due to its structured comparison with A-levels.

title: Exam calendar 2026: Key dates for JEE, NEET, CUET, CBSE, ICSE, UPSC and other major exams
content: The exam calendar for 2026 outlines key dates for major national entrance tests and board examinations, helping students plan the academic year in advance. Exams such as JEE Main, JEE Advanced, NEET UG, CUET and multiple UPSC tests begin early in the year. Board exams conducted by CBSE, ICSE and ISC will run from February to April, with practical exams scheduled earlier.

title: Smooth deliveries on New Years eve? Zomato, Swiggy hike payout to gig workers
content: Zomato and Swiggy are increasing incentives for delivery partners on New Year's Eve. This comes as gig workers plan a nationwide strike on December 31, 2025. Unions are demanding better pay and working conditions. The strike aims to disrupt services during a busy period. Workers seek restoration of old payout structures and removal of 10-minute delivery.

title: 'Skills, patience and passion exemplary': PM Modi on Arjun Erigaisi's World Blitz bronze
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulated Grandmaster Arjun Erigaisi for winning bronze at the World Blitz Championships in Doha. Erigaisi's achievement, following his World Rapid bronze, highlights India's growing prowess in chess. The Prime Minister lauded Erigaisi's skills and passion, stating his success will inspire the youth.

title: Telecom relief: Cabinet clears package for Vodafone Idea, freezes AGR dues at Rs 87,695 crore
content: The Union Cabinet has approved a relief package for Vodafone Idea, freezing Rs 87,695 crore in AGR dues and rescheduling repayment over 10 years from FY32 to FY41.

title: 'World stands with you, Matto': Damien Martyn in induced coma, battles meningitis
content: Damien ‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãMartyn was also part of Australia‚Äôs triumphant 2003 ODI World Cup squad, playing a decisive role in the final against India with an unbeaten 88 in a match-winning partnership with Ricky Ponting. ‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãHe retired from international cricket in 2006 during the Ashes series and has largely kept a low profile since.

title: Candace Owens highlights new claims after eyewitness details on Charlie Kirk death
content: Candace Owens says Mitch Snow‚Äôs claims about Charlie Kirk‚Äôs death need verified timelines, not assumptions. Snow, a retired Army medic, says he was at Fort Huachuca and saw key figures. Online users question his memory and details. No official proof confirms his account. Owens asks for solid evidence to settle the debate.

title: 'Dhurandhar' BO collection day 27 Vs 'Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri' day 7
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' continues its phenomenal run, crossing Rs 715 crore by its 27th day. In stark contrast, Kartik Aaryan and Ananya Panday's 'Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri,' released on Christmas, struggles significantly, failing to reach Rs 30 crore even after its first week. The spy thriller's success overshadows the romantic comedy's performance.

title: Khaleda Zia‚Äôs funeral: Thousands gather in Dhaka to pay last respects ‚Äî live updates
content: Bangladesh mourns the passing of former Prime Minister Khaleda Zia, a pivotal political figure, with a public holiday and three days of state mourning. Thousands gathered for her funeral in Dhaka, attended by regional leaders including India's external affairs minister S Jaishankar. Her death marks the end of an era for the influential BNP chairperson.

title: Gurgaon-Faridabad road: Woman gang-raped, assaulted & thrown out of moving van; gets 12 stitches on face
content: A 25-year-old woman was allegedly raped and assaulted by two men after accepting a lift in a van on the Gurgaon-Faridabad road. She was held captive for nearly three hours and then thrown from the moving vehicle, sustaining severe facial injuries. Police have detained two suspects following a complaint.

title: When will a total solar eclipse, the blood moon & the ring of fire appear in 2026
content: 2026 promises a celestial spectacle with four eclipses, including a rare "ring of fire" and a total solar eclipse visible from mainland Europe. This year marks the beginning of a busy period for skywatchers, with significant lunar and solar events clustering together. Planetary alignments also grace the night sky, offering repeated reasons to look up.

title: New Year alert in Rajasthan: 150kg explosives, batteries and wires seized from car; 2 arrested
content: Police intercepted a car on the Tonk‚ÄìJaipur highway, seizing approximately 150kg of ammonium nitrate hidden in urea sacks. Also recovered were 200 explosive batteries and 1,100 meters of electric wire. Two men, identified as Surendra and Surendra Mochi, were detained for questioning regarding the chemical's origin and intended use.

title: Faridabad woman gang-raped in moving van: 2 accused arrested; Maruti Eco seized
content: Two men have been arrested in connection with the alleged gang rape and assault of a 25-year-old woman in Gurgaon. The victim was reportedly held for three hours in a moving van and then thrown out with severe injuries. Police seized the vehicle and registered an FIR following a complaint from the victim's family.

title: A year of changing views in the Supreme Court
content: The year 2025 saw Supreme Court ‚Äòclarify‚Äô, ‚Äòmodify‚Äô and ‚Äòrecall‚Äô its decisions in a variety of issues ranging from stray dogs to retrospective environmental clearances to pollution norms in response to either public furore or on the urging of authorities

title: Andhra Pradesh disburses over ‚Çπ2,700 crore in NTR Bharosa pensions ahead of the New Year
content: Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu says the decision to release pensions in advance is intended to bring cheer to poor households during the New Year

title: Kerala minister, Thiruvananthapuram mayor spar over use of Smart City e-buses
content: V.V. Rajesh accuses KSRTC of contractual violation, to which Minister K.B. Ganesh Kumar replies with State‚Äôs a 60% stake in Smart City funding, which as per him the Corporation could ill afford to ignore

title: MMU objects to ‚ÄòVande Mataram‚Äô singing competition in J&K
content: The religious body Muttahida Majlis-e-Ulema cites faith concerns; seeks sensitivity in official outreach on the issue

title: Samiti terms MLAs‚Äô protest a farce, says they are not  interested in resolving traffic issues on Ghat road
content: They have neither made practical suggestions to resolve traffic congestion on the Thamarasseri ghat road nor forced the government to face the real reason for the congestion

title: ‚ÄòVote chori‚Äô is taking place via electoral rolls and not EVMs, Trinamool delegation says
content: The delegation highlights ‚Äòlogical discrepancies‚Äô affecting approximately 1.36 crore voters, including in unreasonable parent-child age gaps, grandparents‚Äô ages, name and surname mismatches, and address-related issues

title: ‚ÄòKuppadam‚Äô textiles from Chemancheri gets recognition in Republic Day event in Delhi
content: Two master weavers from the Chemancheri unit of Kozhikode Sarvodaya Sangham have been invited to attend the Republic Day programme

title: Quantum courses to LEAP model, schools in Andhra Pradesh see major policy push in 2025
content: Hosting of mega Parent-Teacher Meet, recruitment of teachers through DSC, implementation of teacher transfers and promotions, unified digital app for teachers, and adoption of NCERT-aligned bilingual curriculum are some of the other major initiatives taken during the year

title: CITU backs February 12 nationwide strike against Labour Codes
content: Conference adopts resolutions demanding repeal of four labour codes and opposing privatisation of the Visakhapatnam Steel Plant; leaders of major trade unions and international labour bodies express solidarity

title: Telangana to launch month-long road safety initiative to reduce accidents from Jan. 1
content: The initiative, which is part of the Centralised Road Safety Action Plan, will witness implementation at the district level

title: BJP seeks NIA probe into Kogilu Layout encroachments, alleges ‚Äòsleeper cell‚Äô threat
content: Leader of opposition in Legislative Assembly R. Ashok, along with other BJP leaders, interacted with residents in the locality and examined identity cards and other documents.

title: Become centre for creating youth enthusiastic about rural development, university told
content: Mahatma Gandhi Rural Development and Panchayat Raj University organises a special lecture on Gandhian Thought in Gadag

title: Watch: In 2026, will regional parties challenge BJP‚Äôs dominance in Maharashtra?
content: In this year-ender special episode of Pulse Maharashtra, Vinaya Deshpande decodes if the regional parties will challenge BJP‚Äôs dominance in the state. The Thackeray cousins have unified, Eknath Shinde has parted ways with BJP in several key corporations, Ajit Pawar has joined hands with Sharad Pawar at a few places. What will the changed regional dynamics mean in the new year?

title: Names of parties, leaders who haven‚Äôt filed asset reports to Lok Ayukta to be published in media
content: Section 22 of the Kerala Lok Ayukta Act 1999 mandates that every public servant and their family members file a statement of assets and liabilities every two years. The deadline for filing the statement for the previous two-year period had expired in June 2024

title: Ex-Bengal Minister Kanti Ganguly summoned for SIR hearing on Jan 2
content: Nearly 15 years after the Left Front lost power in the State, Mr. Ganguly continues to remain active at the grassroots.

title: Blog: In Manipur, The More Things Change, The More They Stay The Same
content: Thousands of people in Manipur will spend a third New Year in relief camps. A few of them have returned to villages in the foothills where the district borders meet. With hours to go before the world enters 2026, we see where things stand today.

title: "Rectify Mistake": BJP Slams Muslim Group's Objections To Vande Mataram
content: A Muslim group's objections to a music competition themed on the national song, Vande Mataram, have been sharply criticised by the BJP.

title: Piped Cooking Gas Prices Cut By Rs 0.7 A Unit In Delhi-NCR
content: Indraprastha Gas Ltd, India's largest city gas retailer, on Wednesday announced a Rs 0.70 cut in prices of natural gas piped into household kitchens for cooking in Delhi and NCR towns.

title: Fireworks, Celebrations: Several Countries Ring In 2026. This Was The First
content: As the world prepares to turn the calendar page, New Zealand once again becomes one of the first countries to welcome the New Year.

title: "Let Lord Shiva Forgive Them": Union Minister On Deepam Row In Tamil Nadu
content: The opposition to lighting the lamp atop the Thirupparankundram hill was politically motivated and lacked understanding of the cultural significance, Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan said on Wednesday.

title: 3 Parties, 8 Days: Man's Quest To Get Ticket For Maharashtra Civic Polls
content: A man with an extensive criminal record switched parties twice before joining a third - all within the span of eight days - in a desperate bid to secure a ticket for the Maharashtra civic polls.

title: "No Official Word": Vodafone Idea Says Hasn't Received Order On Dues Freeze
content: Vodafone Idea on Wednesday issued a clarification after media reports claimed that the Union Cabinet had approved a five-year moratorium and frozen the company's adjusted gross revenue (AGR) dues at Rs 87,695 crore.

title: 75-Year-Old Man, Wife Dead As Fire Breaks Out In Delhi Home
content: An elderly couple died on Wednesday afternoon after a fire broke out at their residence in east Delhi's Shahdara, police said.

title: "Demand For Fair Pay Is Just": Raghav Chadha's New Year's Eve With Gig Workers
content: Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) Rajya Sabha member Raghav Chadha spent New Year's Eve with gig workers, who held a nationwide strike stressing their demands of fair pay, humane working conditions and social security.

title: 'Will Script New Chapter': Bangladesh High Commissioner On S Jaishankar Visit
content: As External Affairs Minister (EAM) S Jaishankar wrapped up his flying Dhaka visit, Bangladesh's High Commissioner to India, Riaz Hamidullah, on Wednesday underscored the scope for deepening Bangladesh-India relations.

title: 26/11 Hero, Sadanand Date Appointed Maharashtra Police Chief
content: The Maharashtra government on Wednesday appointed senior IPS officer Sadanand Date as the new state Director General of Police (DGP).

title: Bomb Threat Note On Car Near Sanjay Raut's Home, Nothing Suspicious Found
content: A car with a bomb threat message written on its window was found parked outside Shiv Sena (UBT) MP Sanjay Raut's residence in Mumbai on Wednesday afternoon, triggering a search of his premises by bomb detection personnel, a police official said.

title: Trump Family Delays Shipment Of Gold-Coloured Smartphone: Report
content: Trump Mobile has pushed back plans to deliver its gold-colored smartphone by year-end, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.

title: China Says It "Successfully Completed" Military Drills Around Taiwan
content: China "successfully completed" military drills around Taiwan that included live-fire exercises aimed at simulating a blockade of key ports and assaults on maritime targets, its military said on Wednesday.

title: Putin Says Russia Believes It Will Win In Ukraine In New Year Address
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin said his country believed it would win in Ukraine, where Moscow has led an almost four-year offensive, in his New Year's Eve address on Wednesday.

title: Eurostar Resumed Service After Power Glitch Sparked Travel Chaos
content: Traffic slowly resumed Wednesday in the Channel tunnel after an electricity failure halted train trips connecting London to the European mainland, as frazzled passengers arrived in France after hours trapped in a powerless train.

title: "Not A Threat": Anand Mahindra Rejects AI Fears In New Year Message
content: AI is not a threat but a catalyst that will elevate practical skills into premium assets, offering income, dignity and transforming factory work into long-term relevance and a lucrative gold-collar profession, Anand Mahindra said.

title: Lashkar's Lahore Meet, Facebook Live, Busts Pak's 'No Terror On Its Soil' Claims
content: Pakistan's duplicitous stance on terrorism has been exposed by a recent video that has laid bare its hypocrisy in its dealings with terror outfits -- particularly in relation with Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT).

title: Zohran Mamdani's 'Al-Qaeda Lawyer' Pick As Legal Advisor Sparks Row
content: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani ruffled feathers after he announced on Tuesday that he is appointing a controversial lawyer as the city's top attorney.

title: Andhra Pradesh power sector charting the course for net zero carbon emissions
content: Sustainability, efficiency, and affordability are the pillars of the sector‚Äôs transformation, says Chief Secretary Vijayanand

title: Tirupati sheds Gudur and embraces Kodur, while Kadapa gets back Rajampeta
content: The district reorganisation exercise has not only reshaped the eastern Rayalaseema districts, but also undone the anomalies left behind by the similar exercise taken up in 2022

title: Bihar govt. approves shooting of over 37 films, web series and documentaries in the State
content: The Art and Culture Department has sought a list of locations from District Magistrates, Art and Culture department officials, different districts which are either important from historic or religious point of view, or shooting point of view

title: National drug survey to study indigenous substance use patterns this year
content: Nearly 20 lakh people to be sampled for this survey on substance use and related disorders across country, report expected to be published by 2027

title: Fresh videos of unlawful activities in Kalaburagi Central Prison surface
content: Over the past few months, several videos have been in circulation online showing inmates enjoying special privileges raising concern

title: Man arrested for ‚Äòvandalising‚Äô Shiva Lingam at Draksharamam temple in A.P.
content: The accused resorted to the act to settle scores with a priest of the temple with whom he had a dispute, say police

title: NDA government in Andhra Pradesh sets the bar high for 2026
content: After recording significant achievement in 2025 by balancing people-centric welfare initiatives with rapid economic and industrial development, the government seeks to drive inclusive growth and sustainable development in the new year

title: Cyberabad police roll out free shuttle service to ease New Year Eve traffic congestion
content: Shuttle service operating from One Golf, Babylon, ADP Onewest, SLN Terminus, Sarath City Mall and InOrbit Mall, ferrying commuters to nearby metro stations and designated cab pick-up points

title: Army‚Äôs animal contingent to make historic debut at Republic Day parade
content: From the icy heights of Siachen to the cold deserts of Ladakh and disaster-hit civilian areas, these animals have quietly shared the burden of duty, courage and sacrifice

title: Over 1,500 coconut trees, acres of casuarina plantation destroyed for constructions near beach: fisherfolk in West Godavari district
content: With catch from sea dwindling, residents of the coastal village of Perupalem have become increasingly dependent on the coconut trees and casuarina plantations they have been growing close to the beach for decades

title: Pro-poor welfare push has lifted per capita income, says Eshwar Khandre
content: The Minister was speaking after inaugurating a district-level ‚ÄòGuarantee Workshop-Guarantee Utsav‚Äô in Bidar

title: Debate over the political optics of CM and Vellappally's car trip roils LDF
content: The association of Pinarayi Vijayan with Vellappally Natesan assumed unintended political overtones against the backdrop of  the latter‚Äôs raucous spat with Muslim social organisations, including those which traditionally hewed close to the LDF, over accusations of demonising minorities¬†

title: Traffic block: Idukki Collector bans road-widening work
content: Works on Kochi-Dhanushkodi National Highway continues to cause hours-long traffic blocks on the route to Munnar

title: Congress plans protests seeking restoration of MGNREGA
content: The BJP-led NDA government has diluted the rural job scheme through policy changes and a new framework that is anti-poor, alleges APCC president Y.S. Sharmila

title: Supreme Court vacation benches including of CJI Surya Kant sits during winter break for first time
content: A statement issued by the Supreme Court said that special sittings had been arranged to ensure the timely consideration of pressing cases that required immediate judicial intervention during the vacation period

title: ED seizes ‚Çπ5 crore in cash, jewellery worth ‚Çπ8 crore in money laundering case
content: The agency initiated probe based on more than 15 FIRs and chargesheets filed by the police in Haryana and Uttar Pradesh

title: Double-engine government in Andhra Pradesh lays strong foundation for a brighter 2026, says Lanka Dinakar
content: Investments worth ‚Çπ8.55 lakh crore have been approved in 2025, generating 8.23 lakh jobs, says the 20-Point programme Chairman

title: HDMC delegation plans to meet CM over land swap issue
content: Union Minister Pralhad Joshi will lead the delegation, Mayor Jyoti Patil announces it in the general body meeting of the municipal corporation

title: Kalinga community looks to regain political influence in Srikakulam district
content: Stressing unity, the community seeks increased representation in forthcoming local body elections and the 2029 general elections through coordinated political mobilisation

title: Shah outlines BJP action plan for Bengal polls, projects Dilip Ghosh as key face
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah held the meeting to take stock of the BJP West Bengal unit's preparedness for the Assembly polls next year, a State leader said

title: ARC recommends OTS for recovery of dues in minorities corporation
content: Panel headed by R.V. Deshpande recommends increased financial assistance to goshalas, merger of kananda authorities, among others

title: Vedike stages protest against corruption in KKRDB works, seeks high-level inquiry
content: Members march from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Chowk to the KKRDB office building, accusing State govt. of turning a blind eye to irregularities

title: Andhra Pradesh to modernise e-Panta App for easier crop registration
content: A meeting chaired by Director of Agriculture Manazir Jeelani Samoon discusses improvements to make the app more user-friendly, including enabling farmers to register their crop details independently from the upcoming rabi season

title: Anantapur registers significant drop in crimes in 2025
content: Crime has gone down to 6,851 this year compared to 8,841 last year; SP attributes it to effective policing and priority to public safety

title: Jana Sena Party eyes 100% strike rate in local body polls
content: Party image boosted by Palle Panduga and Panchayat Raj initiatives under Deputy Chief Minister and JSP president K. Pawan Kalyan, says Vikram

title: Two-day Mannam Jayanti celebrations to begin on Thursday
content: Cyriac Thomas, former member of the National Minority Commission, will inaugurate the Jayanti celebrations at 11 a.m. on Friday

title: Students, youth urged to take the lead in spreading awareness on crime prevention
content: Police Commissioner was addressing a gathering after inaugurating an awareness drive as part of Crime Prevention Month in Kalaburagi

title: Himachal may roll out regulated cannabis cultivation within months, says CM Sukhu
content: Policy framework under finalisation, including rules and regulations surrounding the hemp cultivation, with a focus on medicinal and industrial use

title: Lokayukta catches Public Prosecutor accepting bribe in Kalaburagi
content: According to Lokayukta officials, the bribe was sought for extending a favour to an accused in an atrocities case

title: NFL futures: Seattle Seahawks enter Week 18 as Super Bowl favorites
content: Through 17 weeks of the NFL season, the  Seattle Seahawks  are the new favorites to win the Super Bowl 60, following the  Los Angeles Rams 's loss on "Monday Night Football." The Rams drop to second, as three NFC West teams sit in the top four. The AFC West-winning  Denver Broncos  have the third-best odds to win the Super Bowl at +700. The  San Francisco 49ers  at +850 and the AFC East champion  New England Patriots  at +900. The Seahawks and 49ers meet in Week 18. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.

title: After emphatic win over title rivals, Arsenal can dare to dream once more
content: Steve Nicol makes arsenal premier league title favorites after emphatic win over Aston Villa . the win was more than just a 4-1 victory . it answers a valid question of their journey to this point: could they actually beat one of their rivals for the title?

title: ACC preview: Final Four contenders, more March Madness predictions
content: the 18-team league received its lowest number of NCAA bids in more than a decade . it hasn't been a top-three conference since before 2020 . the ACC had eight top-40 teams in 2019 compared to last season's four .

title: Which NBA star had the best year? The 2025 Golden Basketball goes to ...
content: the Oklahoma City Thunder are 1-2 again in the first installment of the MVP straw poll conducted by ESPN's Tim Bontemps . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Nikola Jokic of the Denver Nuggets battled for MVP of the 2024-25 regular season .

title: Free agent pickups: Look to Saints, Titans amid Week 18 uncertainty
content: the 17th and penultimate Sunday of the season featured excellent performances by new England Patriots QB Drake Maye, Cincinnati Bengals RB Chase Brown and New Orleans Saints WR Chris Olave . the Patriots and Seattle Seahawks each won their 13th game; the Las Vegas Raiders lost their 14th game .

title: Transfer rumors, news: Jo√£o Cancelo back on Barcelona's radar
content: former barcelona loanee is in the sights of the laLiga champions . the 31-year-old is set to leave the Saudi Pro League side during the transfer window following a fallout with manager Simone Inzaghi . cancelo could face competition from Juventus and Internazionale .
